text: You mentioned though about your interest in psychology and criminology...Do you think this comes from a particular reason? Maybe an internal drive towards it?
How long does the personal statement have to be approximately?

Another thing I wanted to suggest to you, I don't know if you've tried this personality test from Myer & Briggs which is a psychological test usually quite accurate and helps you discover more about yourself both personally and professionally.. If you haven't, give it a try and see what comes up :smile: maybe it can help in getting more idea about what you like and how you are as a person

Yeah i know i would find psychology and criminology intresting, i dont have a specific intrest. The personal statement should be around a page, and thank you so much im going to do the quiz right now :smile:
